import { Pipe, PipeTransform } from '@angular/core';
import { iImageExists } from '../interfaces/iImageExists';

@Pipe({
  name: 'fallbackImage',
  standalone: true
})
export class FallbackImagePipe implements PipeTransform {
  transform(value: iImageExists): string {
    if (!value.isImageExists) {
      return "data:image/png;base64,"
    } else {
      return value.imagePath;
    }
  }

}
